Class Sfx

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.media.Sfx
public class Sfx extends Object
This class handles loading and playing sound effects (SFX)

Each sound effect is associated with a SaveDataType entry in the save file, which stores both the file name and its volume level. These settings are loaded into an internal map and used whenever sound effects are played.

This class is responsible for:

  • Loading SFX file paths and volume
  • Storing SFX data in a map based on the SFX type

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      public static void loadMap(SaveDataType sfxType)
      Loads the saved SFX sound type and volume into Map.
      Parameters:
      sfxType - - type of SFX

    • play

      public static void play(SaveDataType type)
      Plays a sound effect (SFX).

      This method retrieves the sound file path and its associated volume from Map determined by type, and then plays the sound.

      Parameters:
      type - the specific SFX type to play

    • reset

      public static void reset(SaveDataType sfxType)
      Changes the Map sound effect (SFX) associated with the SFX type.

      This map is used to rewrite the SFX type specified by sfxType with the sound type and volume settings. The sound type and volume is retrieved from SaveData using SaveDataType.
